title: El Toledo Mejor
author: John Mathews
content: After settling into my new apartment, I felt that I was ready to explore more of Spain. I had heard that Toledo was a beautiful medevial city that was once the the capital of Spain. So, i did some research on how to get there, and I had two options. Either I could take an hour bus ride for free, or hop onto a high speed train for 19 EUR total. Of course, I am a big spender, so I booked a train on a Renfe AVE train from Atocha Station to Toledo.
